description:
Yoshino meets Nao at the university, and they exchange contact information. However, Nao is being blackmailed by Ozu to send Kirishima and Yoshino to a place where he can eliminate both of them.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I`d Rather You Hate Me Than Not Care, Part Two
Je préfère ta haine à ton indifférence (2de partie)
Mukanshin Nara Isso Kirawareta Hou ga Ii: Kouhen
無関心ならいっそ嫌われたほうがいい 後編
